Feature: Event Anomaly Detector

Layer: 3_worlds

Requirements:
- Event windowing (1s/5s/30s)
- 90% compression ratio
- Anomaly score calculation
- Real-time alerting

API Endpoints:
- /events/ingest
- /events/compress
- /events/anomaly/detect

Files to generate:
- core/events/compressor.py
- core/events/anomaly.py
- core/events/alerting.py
", "files": ["src/feature.py", "tests/test_feature.py"], "dependencies": ["fastapi"], "complexity": "medium", "steps": ["1. Design", "2. Implement", "3. Test"]}
